items.name: Suricata | Snort Alerts Overview
items.description: Displays a count of Suricata | Snort alerts grouped by signature

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alerts by Severity and Category
items.value: event_type=="alert" | count() by alert.severity,alert.category | sort count
items.description: Shows all Suricata | Snort alert counts, grouped by category and severity

items.name: Top Suricata | Snort Signatures
items.description: Displays the most frequent Suricata | Snort alert signatures

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alerts by Signature
items.value: event_type=="alert" | count() by alert.signature | sort count
items.description: Shows all Suricata | Snort alert counts, grouped by signature

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alert Categories by Source and Destination
items.value: event_type=="alert" | alerts := union(alert.category) by src_ip, dest_ip
items.description: Shows a list of Suricata | Snort alert categories, grouped by unique source and destination IP addresses

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alert Signatures by Source and Destination
items.value: event_type=="alert" | alerts := union(alert.signature) by src_ip, dest_ip
items.description: Shows a list of Suricata | Snort alert signatures, grouped by unique source and destination IP addresses

items.name: Top Source Ports for Suricata | Snort Alerts
items.description: Displays the top source ports for Suricata | Snort alerts

items.name: Top Destination Ports for Suricata | Snort Alerts
items.description: Shows the top destination ports for Suricata | Snort alerts

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alert Categories by Subnet
items.description: Shows a list of Suricata | Snort alert categories, grouped by CIDR network

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alerts by Protocol
items.description: Shows a count of Suricata | Snort alerts grouped by protocol

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alerts by Classification
items.description: Displays a count of Suricata | Snort alerts grouped by classification

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alerts Timeline
items.value: event_type=="alert" | count() by ts := floor(ts, 1h) | sort ts
items.description: Shows a timeline of Suricata | Snort alerts with counts per hour

items.name: SSuricata | Snort Alerts by Priority
items.description: Displays a count of Suricata | Snort alerts grouped by priority

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alerts with Payload
items.value: event_type=="alert" AND payload != null | cut ts, src_ip, dest_ip, proto, payload | sort -r ts
items.description: Displays Suricata | Snort alerts that have payload data

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alerts by Sensor
items.description: Shows a count of Suricata | Snort alerts grouped by sensor

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alerts by Network Segment
items.value: event_type=="alert" | put segment := network_of(dest_ip) | count() by segment | sort -r
items.description: Shows Suricata | Snort alerts grouped by network segment (based on destination IP)

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alerts by Source IP
items.description: Shows a count of Suricata | Snort alerts grouped by source IP

items.name: Suricata | Snort Alerts by Destination IP
items.description: Shows a count of Suricata | Snort alerts grouped by Destination IP

items.name: Web Application Firewall (WAF) Alerts
items.value: event_type=="alert" AND alert.category=="WAF" | count() by alert.signature | sort -r
items.description: Displays alerts generated by the Web Application Firewall
